item.title: Digging sticks used by men
item.summary: The digging-sticks used by men are not weighted with stones. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-23. 8083 rev., note).
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-23
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: used by men, with no stone
used by women, weighted by a stone
stick used by men and woman
used to weight the women's digging stick
the man's digging stick does not have one
their digging stick has no stone
their digging stick weighted by a stone
